column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The hamburger we ordered had no seasoning on the hamburger patty it was just cooked plain. The potatoes either from the hamburger nor the appetizer had no flavor
column2: it was potatoes cut and baked with no seasoning at all
column3: the pork chop with polenta was good
column4: the pork didn't have a lot of flavor either and it was dry but the polenta was delicious.
